body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Tyler Walker and the customer's name is Margaret Coleman.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Tyler Walker, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Tyler, I'm Margaret Coleman. I'm having some issues with my new motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Margaret. Can you please tell me what specific issues you are experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's been making a strange noise when I ride it, and I've only had it for a couple of weeks.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds frustrating. Just to make sure we assist you properly, could I have your address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four Elm Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret. And may I also have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, three four one, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for the information. I'll make sure our service team takes a look at your motorcycle right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Margaret! Thank you for your time, and if you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
